meanings: take care of a terminally ill patient
a strike for a definite[an indefinite] period

meanings.meaning: Announcement of Discount on Items for Limited Amount of Time

vlive.korean: "시한부 방송". - 아니에요. 시한부 방송. "Deathbed broadcast". - No, it's not. 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 몰래 찾아왔어요! - 막냉이들♡
우리 시한부 방송을 살려주고 계세요, 지금. She's saving our V. 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 따르릉 죠에게 전화왔지호📞
오, 우리의 시한부 방송을! This V was terminal until you came! 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 따르릉 죠에게 전화왔지호📞
vlive.english: This V was terminal until you came!

vlive.korean: 근데 "K"가 시한부 선고를 받습니다. And "K" is a terminally ill patient. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Everbrown - 에버브라운 '에버브라운 X 이병헌의 영화 이야기'
vlive.english: And "K" is a terminally ill patient.

vlive.korean: 근데 시한부 선고를 받게 돼요. But she also gets diagnosed that she's terminally ill. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [REPLAY]자체발광 오피스 X 앞터V(Bling Bling Office X Early Interview)
vlive.english: But she also gets diagnosed that she's terminally ill.

examples.korean: I've heard that his days are numbered[limited]. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사람 시한부 생명이라더군 Neungyule
examples.english: I've heard that his days are numbered[limited]. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The movie is about a terminally ill woman's love story. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 영화는 시한부 인생을 살고 있는 한 여자의 사랑 이야기다 Neungyule
examples.english: The movie is about a terminally ill woman's love story. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Man: If a person is terminally ill, isn't it best to let them live out the remainder of their lives with as little pain as possible? 듣기 Add to Wordbook M: 시한부 환자에게는, 남은 삶 동안, 가능한 한 고통 없이 살도록 하는 게 최선이 아닐까? Neungyule
examples.english: Man: If a person is terminally ill, isn't it best to let them live out the remainder of their lives with as little pain as possible? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If a person is terminally ill, isn't it best to let them live out the remainder of their lives with as little pain as possible? Some critics complain about the costs of Provenge, but in a moral world a monetary value cannot be placed on a life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 시한부 환자에게는, 남은 삶 동안, 가능한 한 고통 없이 살도록 하는 게 최선이 아니겠는가? 프로벤지에 대해 비판적인 시각을 지닌 일부 사람들은, 프로벤지가 너무 비싸다고 불평하지만, 도의적인 측면에서는 금전적 가치보다 사람의 생명이 더 소중한 것이다. Neungyule
examples.english: If a person is terminally ill, isn't it best to let them live out the remainder of their lives with as little pain as possible? Some critics complain about the costs of Provenge, but in a moral world a monetary value cannot be placed on a life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: With the title song "Failing in Love"from their second album gaining popularity , this is one group ready to take off . 듣기 Add to Wordbook 2집 앨범 타이틀 곡 "시한부"로 인기를 얻으면서, 이 그룹은 뜰 채비를 갖추었다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: With the title song "Failing in Love"from their second album gaining popularity , this is one group ready to take off . Add to Wordbook
